littleTitleProjet: Training a deep learning model to recognize photos of animals and vehicules
resultRecap: For my first project in deep learning I coded an AI model using convolutional neural networks to recognize photos of animals and vehicules from the CIFAR10 dataset. The model reached an accuracy of 85% and I was able to succesfully recognize my cats.
skills: Making a model with convolutional neural networks
Trying a lot of diffrent options to improve the accuracy of the model
Learning how to use Pytorch and Cuda

photoProjet.desc: The training loss of my model over 30 epochs
My model recognizing photos of my cats
